p.3: Our industry leading eCommerce client is searching for an experienced Data Scientist to work in a high volume cloud native Azure platform with large data sets, making analytical insights from visualizations to help drive business decisions. This position can be 100% Remote / Work From Home supporting EST Time Zone.
p.5: The Data Scientist will work with Product Managers to create data analytics for a high volume, fault tolerant, high available cloud native environment using Azure, Power BI, and complex SQL. Ideal candidates will have a strong understanding of data transformation and be able to deliver insightful data visualization translating complex data into actionable insights.

text: : $65.00 - $75.00/hr BOE C2C or W2 (Health, Dental, Vision and 401k Benefits)

li: 3-5+ Years of Data Science experience working with SQL, Python, Tableau or PowerBI
li.1: Must have strengths in Data Visualization and Data Analysis in Data-Driven environments
li.2: Must have the ability to work with Product Managers and stakeholders to deliver analytical insights and design visualizations into the product roadmap
li.3: Retail / eCommerce large data set background is highly desired
li.4: Master=E2=80=99s Degree or PhD in a related course is desired

p.13: For immediate consideration, please send updated MS Word resume to: JPearce@eliassen.com
